Explanations about Options.-D(C): To manually connect via config for debugging use this: .  -d = debug/verbose -dd == super verbose .  -D = driver.
Explanations about Options.-D(M):
Driver to use (can be multiple drivers: nl80211,wext). (Per interface, see the
 available options below.)
Explanations about Options.-i(M):
Interface to listen on. Multiple instances of this option can be present, one per
 interface, separated by -N option (see below).

Answers.MP Summary: Wi-Fi Protected Access client and IEEE 802.1X supplicant
Top-3 Scripts:
au_138472: sudo wpa_supplicant -B -i wlan0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf -D wext
sudo dhclient wlan0

wpa_supplicant -h

ul_250562: ##Wireless NIC
allow-hotplug wlan0
iface wlan0 inet manual
wpa-roam /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
iface open_wifi inet dhcp

ctrl_interface=DIR=/var/run/wpa_supplicant GROUP=netdev
update_config=1

##Open_Wifi
network={
    ssid=""
    key_mgmt=NONE
    id_str="open_wifi"
}

wpa_supplicant -d -i wlan0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf -D wext

ul_283722: sudo ip link set wlan0 down
sudo ip link set wlan0 up
sudo wpa_supplicant -B -iwlan0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf -Dnl80211,wext
sudo dhclient wlan0

wpa_supplicant -B -i wlan0 -c <(wpa_passphrase "Your_SSID" Your_passphrase) && dhclient wlan0
